creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
description: shaft of light on a crumbling wall, left of center; silhouette of boy's face at bottom center; figure wearing a hat, seen from back, to left of boy
inscription:
Inscription

on back, in pencil: [F 11 / 13 / 17 x 2 hm in center / 15 x 2 lt side / & / flashlight / G1 (?) #3]
title: Bolivia
